name: Valk_Beroya
content:
Valk Beroya was a Human female Mandalorian warrior and the wife of Jos Beroya. Valk and her husband were members of Clan Vizla, and she wore white Mandalorian armor with blue and black markings. Shortly before the Battle of Rishi in the Galactic War, a group of independent operatives came to the clan's enclave on Tracyn Island to speak with Vizla, and Jos and Valk fought the group as part of Vizla's "challenges." The pair were defeated, though not killed.
Later, Valk Beroya joined Shae Vizla in her siege of the Eternal Empire's droid factory on Darvannis, leading her team inside the factory.
Jos and Valk Beroya appear as the second-to-last boss in "Blood Hunt," a Flashpoint added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in the 2014 Digital Expansion Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan.
"Beroya" is the Mandalorian word for "Bounty Hunter" in Mando'a.
